meanings.definition: A person who gives advice or guidance.
meanings.sent1: My teacher is always there to help me as my adviser.
meanings.sent2: The financial advisers at the bank suggested I invest in stocks.
meanings.sent3: The wise adviser reminded the young prince to always listen before speaking.
meanings.sent4: She was like a beacon of light, a trusted adviser guiding me through tough decisions.
meanings.sent5: The adviser's words were like a compass, pointing me in the right direction.

meanings.definition: A group of people who provide advice or recommendations.
meanings.sent1: The council of advisers met to discuss the new policy.
meanings.sent2: The team of advisers helped the company make strategic decisions.
meanings.sent3: The group of advisers had a heated debate over the best course of action.
meanings.sent4: The advisers acted as a shield, protecting the company from making mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The advisers were like a puzzle, each piece contributing to the bigger picture.
